resources.string: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS NOTE( ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, TITLE TEXT , DESCRIPTION TEXT, CREATED_DATE_TIME TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL, MODIFIED_DATE_TIME TEXT ,TYPE INTEGER)
INSERT INTO NOTE ( TITLE, DESCRIPTION, CREATED_DATE_TIME,MODIFIED_DATE_TIME,TYPE) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE NOTE SET TITLE = ?, DESCRIPTION = ? , MODIFIED_DATE_TIME = ?, TYPE = ? WHERE CREATED_DATE_TIME = ?
